version_description:
Welcome to Marvel Hero Tales!

Latest Update includes:
-Bug Fixes.
-Performance updates

Welcome to Marvel Hero Tales!

Latest Update includes:

- Minor bug fixes.

Captain Marvel has arrived in Marvel Hero Tales! Something has fallen to Earth and it’s up to Captain Marvel to look into it. There have been reports of very suspicious civilians sneaking about, could there be more to them than meets the eye?

This story is available exclusively to Marvel Hero Tales Members. If you’re not a Member yet, you can still join at the cheaper introductory price!

-Minor improvements & bug fixes
-New pop up screen to inform players about new characters, comic issues, and in-app events!

Halloween has come to NYC and things are getting spooky!

Keep your eyes peeled for ghostly goings-on! Our heroes won’t be the only ones in costumes as the local citizens dress to impress.

Winter has arrived in NYC, the streets are snowy, the holidays are coming and the bad guys are up to no good!

Keep the streets safe and investigate the glowing portals in part 1 of 'Rise of the Frost Giants'.
We've webbed smashed some bothersome bugs!
With children at home, fill that time with some educational fun. Marvel Hero Tales now has a free trial of 30 days, extended from the previous 7 days.
There’s a new Avenger in town! Take part in new quests as Scarlet Witch, using the power of language to investigate chaotic magical disturbances in New York.
